API.ADK

Class ErrorBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • API.ADK.ErrorBuffer

  • public class ErrorBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure for the Error Flag. This error structure contains the status of the CAN Controller as defined in CANInfo and the status of the transmit and receive threads for each device.
    Author:
    hroesdiyono

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ReturnCode receiveThreadStatus
      The status of the receive thread Driver.CANDevice.ReceiveData.
      CANInfo status
      The status of the CAN Controller.
      ReturnCode transmitThreadStatus
      The status of the transmit thread Driver.CANDevice.TransmitBulkMessage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorBuffer()
      The default constructor of the ErrorBuffer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resetBuffer()
      Reset the error buffer.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • status

        public CANInfo status
        The status of the CAN Controller. Since currently there is only 1 CAN controller for each device, there is only one status.

      • transmitThreadStatus

        public ReturnCode transmitThreadStatus
        The status of the transmit thread Driver.CANDevice.TransmitBulkMessage. The status could be ReturnCode.THREAD_STOPPED, ReturnCode.THREAD_RUNNING

      • receiveThreadStatus

        public ReturnCode receiveThreadStatus
        The status of the receive thread Driver.CANDevice.ReceiveData. It could be ReturnCode.THREAD_STOPPED, ReturnCode.THREAD_RUNNING

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorBuffer

        public ErrorBuffer()
        The default constructor of the ErrorBuffer.

    • Method Detail

      • resetBuffer

        public void resetBuffer()
        Reset the error buffer.
